price: (43) It is He who confers blessing upon you,[1204] and His angels [ask Him to do so] that He may bring you out from darknesses into the light. And ever is He, to the believers, Merciful.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُصَلِّي عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَمَلَٰٓئِكَتُهُۥ لِيُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِۚ وَكَانَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ رَحِيمٗا
footnotes: [1204]- i.e., Allāh (subḥānahu wa taʿālā) cares for you and covers you with His mercy.  An additional meaning is that He praises you in the presence of the angels.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī yuṣallī ʿalaykum wamalāikatuhu liyukh'rijakum mina al-ẓulumāti ilā al-nūri wakāna bil-mu'minīna raḥīman
translations: so that He may bring you out
